QuestData.Title: Report on the Rebels
QuestData.Description:
I am impressed with what you have accomplished today. I hope you agree, $n.
We have successfully shut down the nefarious activities of these Primalist-allied rebels. For now at least. We will need to keep a close watch on any dissent going forward.
Return to Captain Drine at your earliest convenience. She will want our full report.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Captain Drine at the top floor of the Seat of the Aspects.
QuestData.RewardText:
Welcome back, $n.
My eyes and ears have just told me the good news.
